I am going to bring my favorite new promoted character class:

practical mage:
1)it would have the same basic attack as an archmage
attacks are as follows:
-teleport/leave teleport marker
-teleport friends/teleport foes
-freeze time/slow down time
-create teleporters/create blackholes
